AxMacroDictionary.Name: SABatchTracingParameters
AxMacroDictionary.Source:
/// /// This source code is freeware and is provided on an "as is" basis without warranties of any kind, /// whether express or implied, including without limitation warranties that the code is free of defect, /// fit for a particular purpose or non-infringing. The entire risk as to the quality and performance of /// the code is with the end user. /// /// /// These macros are used to specify defaults for batch tracing. /// Do not adjust these, as they could break the batch tracing. /// #define.IncludeSQLBindParmValues(NoYes::No) #define.MinFileSizeLimit(100) #define.MaxFileSizeLimit(1000) #define.MaxFileSize(1000) #define.DefaultFileSize(1000) #define.MinTraceMinsLimit(1) #define.MaxTraceMinsLimit(60) #define.MaxTraceMins(60) #define.SysFindTraceFormSortDesc(NoYes::No)
#define.MinBatchHoursLimit(0) #define.MaxBatchHoursLimit(168) #define.MaxBatchHours(24)
#define.TaskCreatePerBundle(100) #define.TaskCreatePerBundleMin(10) #define.TaskCreatePerBundleMax(200) #define.MaxTaskToCreate(500) #define.MaxTaskToCreateMin(50) #define.MaxTaskToCreateMax(1000) #define.PollingDelayTaskBundle(30) #define.PollingDelayTaskBundleMin(30) #define.PollingDelayTaskBundleMax(120) #define.PollingDelayStartStop(10) #define.PollingDelayStartStopMin(5) #define.PollingDelayStartStopMax(30)
#define.SchedulingPriorityIsOverridden(NoYes::No) #define.SchedulingPriority(BatchSchedulingPriority::Normal)
#define.MaximumEtlFileSizeInMbConfigKey('MaximumEtlFileSizeInMb')
